reviews.text: I got an extra large pizza which was the size of a large. And an order of wedges, that had about 9-10 wedges in it. And some of the wedges weren't a full size wedge. So you'll pay about a dollar for each wedge. So the extra large pizza and wedges were actually small, but the price was big. I will say it was good. And the customer service was good also.
Great crust, creative topping combinations plus make your own. Possibly the best pizza in town.
Tony‚Äôs sold this place is different now. They don‚Äôt have a menu and they don‚Äôt have or know there own website.

Came in to the stockdale location and was greeted by Cameron and had a truly great experience just waiting for what was a super awesome great event quality pizza!!! Paige and Faith were also great and super friendly and professional and just went out of their way to say hello to me and even make some small talk while I was waiting what I thought was a very short amount of time compared to every other place in town‚Ä¶.food was outstanding and wow just an all  around great experience! Great local business and even better employees! Tony‚Äôs has my business 100% moving forward!

Ladies made me feel like an inconvenience, placed an order online as I was driving home, said it would be ready a 2:41pm I ended up getting there early at 2:32pm so I walked in. Lady asked if I was there for a pick up, I said yes and told her my name, she said the pick up is for 2:41 so it will be ready at 2:41. I wasn‚Äôt expecting it to be ready I just got there early, so I just had a seat and waited. And then I could tell I must have struck a nerve for entering the premises early because when it was ready she put it on the counter and said It‚Äôs ready, see right at 2:41. I was like ok great thanks.

The pizza is the best in town, and for what it‚Äôs worth I have never seen those ladies in there before, assuming they thought I was a good delivery service driver or something but still they should be treating them like that either. 100% would still recommend, just don‚Äôt walk in the door before your order says it will be ready.

detailedReviews.author: Tom A
detailedReviews.text: People were nice, but this is just not good pizza.   Crust is like bread, not like crisp/chewy.

detailedReviews.author: Junny Day
detailedReviews.text: I love Tony‚Äôs pizza,

detailedReviews.author: Patrick Mcmillan
detailedReviews.text: Good pizza

detailedReviews.author: R C
detailedReviews.text: Just moved back to Kern. Tony's pizza was better than I remembered. Great pizza and quick service at this location. I'm definitely ordering again!

detailedReviews.author: Eric Pori
detailedReviews.text: Always good pizza and always ready on time

detailedReviews.author: Jim Dillon
detailedReviews.text: Food came out quick, the staff was friendly and helpful.

detailedReviews.author: Tia Nickols
detailedReviews.text: Every time these 2 girls are working it's awesome. The best pizza and service

detailedReviews.author: Joseph Noel
detailedReviews.text:
Ladies made me feel like an inconvenience, placed an order online as I was driving home, said it would be ready a 2:41pm I ended up getting there early at 2:32pm so I walked in. Lady asked if I was there for a pick up, I said yes and told her my name, she said the pick up is for 2:41 so it will be ready at 2:41. I wasn‚Äôt expecting it to be ready I just got there early, so I just had a seat and waited. And then I could tell I must have struck a nerve for entering the premises early because when it was ready she put it on the counter and said It‚Äôs ready, see right at 2:41. I was like ok great thanks.

The pizza is the best in town, and for what it‚Äôs worth I have never seen those ladies in there before, assuming they thought I was a good delivery service driver or something but still they should be treating them like that either. 100% would still recommend, just don‚Äôt walk in the door before your order says it will be ready.

detailedReviews.author: Laura Chavez
detailedReviews.text: Love Tony's Pizza! Very expensive, but the best pizza I've had!

detailedReviews.author: B. R.
detailedReviews.text: I got an extra large pizza which was the size of a large. And an order of wedges, that had about 9-10 wedges in it. And some of the wedges weren't a full size wedge. So you'll pay about a dollar for each wedge. So the extra large pizza and wedges were actually small, but the price was big. I will say it was good. And the customer service was good also.

detailedReviews.author: Scooter Magic
detailedReviews.text: Amazing service, excellent food served fresh and hot and customer service is spectacular.  Very willing to serve with a smile. Very busy means it's popular amongst customers.

detailedReviews.author: Dallas Hensley
detailedReviews.text: As a delivery driver for Uber, I am always picking up food from this location and they are always super sweet and helpful. The food is a little pricy but I really like their pizza. It is too bomb!

detailedReviews.author: Derek Valencia
detailedReviews.text: Really good

detailedReviews.author: Jeffrey Tobin
detailedReviews.text: Honestly wish i could send a picture. The worst pizza i have seen from Tonys. had a split pizza half and half 5 pieces of one and 10 of the other. I guess we are going back to Rusty's. They never fail us!

detailedReviews.author: Shannon Tolson
detailedReviews.text: The Pizza today was weak on toppings didn't look like a combination very disappointed. Usually the Pizza is loaded up with toppings not today.

detailedReviews.author: Fernando Perez
detailedReviews.text: Fast service and good food.

detailedReviews.author: Cheng-En Chan
detailedReviews.text: It's a cool Pizza place in Bakersfield; although it was a little bit too salty but they were free to upgrade my small pizza to medium

detailedReviews.author: terry brown
detailedReviews.text: The service is great and the girls are pretty oh yeah the food is good too

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.5/5 rating across 36 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise the fast service and quick food preparation at Tony's Pizza, making it a top choice for convenience. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The friendly and professional staff at Tony's Pizza enhance the overall dining experience, making customers feel welcome and valued. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
Tony's Pizza is celebrated for its creative topping combinations and high-quality pizza, often described as the best in town. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
improvementOpportunities: Lack of menu and website awareness - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
Negative reviews about pizza quality and portion sizes - review management can address this concern
Competition with other pizza places (e.g., Rusty's) - social media marketing can improve this area
